meaning: offence requiring the involvement of the community in the beginning and the rest
meaning_lit: with the community in the beginning and the rest

sentence: yāvatatiyañ'ce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, icc'etaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, saṅghādiseso
pali_1: being argued with up to three times, shouldrelinquish that [course], then this is good, [but] if he should notrelinquish [it]: [this is a case concerning] the community in thebeginning and in the rest [of the procedure].
